channel.title: social on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in social on My Blog

item.title: Mansplaining
item.description: It’s addressed from the POV of a cis male. The narrator (‘I’, a cis male) is talking about ‘you’ (a non cis male), who’s supposedly a colleague. Vibrant as ever, my voice seeks to explain the working of the quantum mechanical treatment of a free particle The tone is calm, but assertive, as if my tongue drives the paddle of your mind. I’ve ended my speech with a short puff, waiting for approval.
